## ITileDecoder.connect() method

Connect to decoder.

Should be implemented by implementations that use special resources that decode jobs like WebWorkers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
connect(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
